channel.title: Mini on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Mini on Game6r

item.title: Mini dolphin game for girls
item.description: Organize a real show with dolphins! Your task is to control a cute dolphin and show a variety of tricks that will please the audience. Each successful feast will bring money and new visitors to the show. With the accumulated finances, you can buy a cute outfit for a dolphin.

item.title: Mini golf game
item.description: The Mini Golf game invites you to take part in an exciting competition. You have to demonstrate the ability to correctly calculate the trajectory of the golf ball and the power of the throw. After making 10 hits, you must Crazy Games the maximum number of bonus points. During Mini Golf, try to put the ball into the hole in one attempt, and then, in addition to points, you can get an extra hit.
